bibl.title: Niches in an Ecosystem: The Choice of Coptic for Legal Instruments in Late Antique Egypt.
bibl.note: In memory of Mirrit Boutros Ghali (†1992) and of Jean Bingen (†2012). - Surveys the first papyrological evidences on the usage of Coptic for legal instruments in late antique Egypt (in part. in the archive of Dioscorus of Aphrodito), focusing on the social reasons of the choice of that language instead of Greek. - The beginning? - What is a legal document? - Accident? - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
